attributes.action: Ask the Queen To Sort All This Mess Out With Brexit.
attributes.additional_details:
We only have 1 life & your ruining the future.
Sort the police, sort the nhs & sort tax’s, fleecing everyone. Help mental health.
attributes.background: I dont watch,nor am i into politics,until brexit started. Its an absolute joke all this.How are these kinds of people running a country?. Why not ask her Majesty to sort this mess out & fix this beautiful country & enjoy life instead of just Drama every day.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
